entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
